Emphasizing the importance of brain health, he discussed the rise in diabetic drugs for weight loss & the need for a balanced lifestyle. On AI in healthcare, Dr. Gupta advocates for a "trust, but verify" approach to ensure accuracy & combat misinformation. Let's keep pushing for progress!
